articles.title: FM Spokesman Blasts U.S. for Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Blasts U.S. for Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Wednesday as regards the fact that the U.S. re-listed the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism":
					 On November 21, the U.S. made a scene of re-listing the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) as a "state sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 Following Trump's reckless remark on the UN arena of "totally destroying" our country, the U.S. labeled the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" this time. This is a serious provocation and a violent infringement upon our dignified country.
					
					 Since 1979 the U.S. has been labeling the countries that are not obedient to it as "state sponsors of terrorism". In January 1988, it listed our country as a "state sponsor of terrorism" and de-listed it in October 2008.
					
					 The U.S. deleted Iraq and Libya from the list of "state sponsor of terrorism" that gave in to its pressure. It also deleted Cuba from the list as a part of the normalization of bilateral relations. These facts clearly show that the label of "state sponsor of terrorism" is just a tool for American style authoritarianism that can be attached or removed at any time in accordance with its interests.
					
					 The U.S., the kingpin of all kinds of terrorism who cannot even prevent terror in its own territory, is acting like an "international judge on terrorism" while attaching or removing the label of "state sponsor of terrorism" on sovereign countries. This is clearly an absurdity and a mockery to the world peace and security.
					
					 The act of listing other countries as "state sponsors of terrorism" by the U.S. is one of the heinous means to suffocate independent countries disobedient to it, and it is only a cloak to hide its incompetence.
					
					 The DPRK government values international justice and peace, and consistently stands against all forms of terrorism and any sponsorship for terrorism. That's why the DPRK announced that it would faithfully fulfill its duty of nuclear non-proliferation before the international society as a responsible nuclear power.
					
					 We have nothing to do with "terrorism" and we do not care whether the U.S. puts a cap of "terrorism" on us or not.
					
					 This time, while re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism", the U.S. announced additional sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of blocking illegal funds for "prohibited nuclear and ballistic missile program of the DPRK".
					
					 The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are the deterrence to safeguard our sovereignty and our rights to existence and development from the U.S. heinous hostile policy and nuclear threats that have lasted for over half a century, and as long as the U.S. continues with its anti-DPRK hostile policy, our deterrence will be further strengthened.
					
					 By re-listing the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism", the U.S. openly revealed to the whole world its intention to destroy our ideology and system by using all kinds of means and methods.
					
					 Not content with its sanctions against our country, the U.S. is making a last-ditch attempt to suffocate our country by labeling it as a "state sponsor terrorism". However, no sanction or pressure can stand up to the great and limitless strength of self-reliance and self-development of our people who are closely rallied around their leader.
					
					 Our army and people are full of rage and anger towards the heinous gangsters who dared to put the name of our sacred country in this wretched list of "terrorism" and are hardening their will to settle all accounts with those gangsters at any time in any way.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about some kind of "peaceful solution" while making a provocation by labeling our dignified country as a "state sponsor of terrorism". Its pitiful lot reaffirms the philosophical truth that we were absolutely right to choose the path for simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the up-building of the nuclear force and we must continue to keep the treasured nuclear sword in our hands more tightly.
					
					 The U.S. will be held entirely accountable for all the consequences to be entailed by its impudent provocation to the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Flayed for Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
U.S. Flayed for Re-listing DPRK as "Sponsor of Terrorism"
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee Wednesday issued a statement to denounce Trump for having announced at the ministerial-level meeting of the White House on Nov. 21 that the DPRK will be re-listed as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					 The statement said:
					
					 Trump let loose a torrent of brigandish abuses, claiming that the re-listing of the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" should have been taken long ago and it is a "murderous regime" which threatens the whole world with nukes and goes to all lengths to back international terrorism. And he told that additional maximum sanctions and pressure would be taken in succession upon the DPRK and those countries and individuals doing business with it.
					
					 The U.S. act of re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism" is a hideous political provocation as it has neither ground nor validity.
					
					 Now that Trump has made an extra-large provocation, tantamount to another declaration of war against the DPRK, its army and people will not sit on their hands.
					
					 Trump should be mindful that more desperate efforts Trump makes to strangle the DPRK by "demonizing" it, dearer price the U.S. will have to pay for it, and stop at once such fruitless sanctions and pressure against the DPRK and the brigandish step of re-listing the DPRK as a "sponsor of terrorism".
					
					 The U.S. should know that the DPRK's future countermeasures will be up to the former's action.
					
					 We take this opportunity to warn the Abe group of Japan and the south Korean authorities, who act as puppets and faithful dogs of the U.S., zealously working to please their master, not to go reckless any longer if they are concerned about their future.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets European Politicians
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets European Politicians
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday had a talk with a delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe led by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Talks between Heads of DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Groups
articles.content:
Talks between Heads of DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Groups
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group, and Baasankhuu Oktyabri, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were officials concerned and from the opposite side entourage of the chairman and a staff member of the Mongolian embassy here.
					
					 At the talks the two sides exchanged views on further development of the relations between the two parliamentary groups.

articles.title: Greetings to Lebanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Lebanese President
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Michel Aoun, president of the Republic of Lebanon, on Wednesday on the 74th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam wished the Lebanese president bigger successes in his work for peace, stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative Distributed as UN Official Document
articles.content:
Letter of DPRK Permanent Representative Distributed as UN Official Document
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A letter of the DPRK permanent representative at the United Nations to the UN secretary general was distributed as an official document A/72/593-S/2017/946 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on Nov. 18..
					 The letter was sent to protest the U.S. nuclear war exercises targeting the DPRK.

articles.title: Palestinian Embassy Officials Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Palestinian Embassy Officials Visit Korean Revolution Museum
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, and a staff member of his embassy Wednesday visited the Korean Revolution Museum on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the proclamation of the State of Palestine and the Day of World Solidarity with the Palestinian people.
					 The guests went round various rooms of the museum, being briefed on the fact that the museum had been built into a great hall of national treasure comprehensively dealing with the revolutionary history of the great persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: European Politicians Visit Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
European Politicians Visit Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe led by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell on Wednesday visited the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.
					 The guests went round various parts of the factory turned into a comprehensive foodstuff producer for children.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Ryuwon Footwear Factory.

articles.title: Juche Idea Followers Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Juche Idea Followers Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations in different countries visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The visitors looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home of the President, being briefed on the history of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Harish Gupta, vice director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the President is the peerlessly great man as he defeated the Japanese imperialists to liberate the country, adding the visit to his old home makes them recall his noble life with deep emotion.
					
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, stressed that Mangyongdae is the sacred cradle of revolution.
					
					 The guests also toured the Central Zoo, the Pyongyang Bag Factory, etc.

articles.title: Workshop Held to Mark World Toilet Day
articles.content:
Workshop Held to Mark World Toilet Day
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A workshop was held at the Grand People's Study House on Wednesday to mark World Toilet Day.
					 Present there were officials from the Ministry of Urban Management, the Ministry of Public Health, the Ministry of Agriculture, the Grand People's Study House and relevant units, the UN resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative, members of missions of the UNICEF, WHO, the European Union Programme Support, the Cooperation Office of Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK, and members of delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working here.
					
					 Speakers noted that sewage, neither purified nor recycled, spread various diseases worldwide, thus affecting people's health.
					
					 They underscored the need to purify sewage without fail as it is an important work to protect natural environment and provide people with more hygienic and cultured living conditions.
					
					 Then followed speeches on such subjects as "History of World Toilet Day".
					
					 The participants watched a scientific film dealing with the transformation of sanitary facilities in the countryside and enjoyed an art performance given by children.

articles.title: Fertilizer Production Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Fertilizer Production Goes Up in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex in the DPRK boosts production in recent months.
					 The complex produced one thousand and hundreds tons of fertilizer on a daily average in October after finishing the project to repair the production process of Juche fertilizer and expand its capacity in a short span of time.
					
					 In November, it has surpassed the actual daily output of October by 1.2 times every day.
					
					 Now, the complex has improved the technical management of equipment for increased production.

articles.title: Korean-Style Socialism, Lifeline of DPRK People
articles.content:
Korean-Style Socialism, Lifeline of DPRK People
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- It has been 25 years since leader Kim Jong Il made public his immortal work "Socialism Is the Lifeline of Our People".
					 The work is run through with the strong will of the Workers' Party of Korea to keep socialism as a firm faith and accomplish the socialist cause without fail.
					
					 After its publication, the DPRK people came to have cherished the Juche-oriented socialism more deeply in their minds as an unyielding faith.
					
					 Though the imperialist allied forces have remained evermore persistent in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, the dignity of its people has been surely defended and state policies for the people have continued to be enforced thanks to the Korean-style socialism embodying the Juche-oriented outlook on the people and people-oriented philosophy.
					
					 Ordinary working people have been elected to the Supreme People's Assembly and put forward as heroes of the era.
					
					 Children's palaces and grand study houses and fantastic streets for people took their shapes one after another in excellent locations of the country, all of which can be seen only in the DPRK where any work for the people's well-being is regarded as the supreme justice.
					
					 Therefore, stories about the loving care for the people can be heard from every part of the country where top priority is given to the interests and convenience of people and everything serves for their well-being.
					
					 It can be well evidenced by the fact that last year, the major thrust of the 200-day campaign was diverted into the restoration of the flood-hit northern part of North Hamgyong Province and thus the disaster area was turned into a fairyland for the people in a little more than two months.
					
					 Indeed, socialism is the lifeline and soul of the DPRK people.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Blackmail Will be Unworkable for DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Blackmail Will be Unworkable for DPRK
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. newspaper Washington Post conveyed the contents of a report of the U.S. Department of Defense analyzing consequences to be entailed by the military actions between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the U.S. In a brief, the key to detecting and removing the DPRK's tunnels keeping nukes is to throw the U.S. ground force into the DPRK. It is the conclusion from the theory that it is impossible to found and control the underground bases preserving the nukes in the DPRK without throwing the U.S. ground force into it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. revealed once again its warlike nature before the international community, vociferating that all the programs including the military option are on the table.
					
					 The U.S. spreading of theory on throwing its ground force into the DPRK cannot be but connected to war maniac Trump's Asia trip.
					
					 Trump's junket to Asia was a tour for confrontation to deprive the DPRK of the nuclear deterrence for self-defence. The U.S. was vociferous everywhere it went about "peace through strength" and "overwhelming superiority of U.S. power".
					
					 Timed to coincide with Trump's Asia trip, the U.S. conducted a large joint military drill with its junior allies in the waters off the Korean peninsula by sending three nuclear carrier strike groups.
					
					 The reckless remarks of war made by the old lunatic Trump will not frighten and block the DPRK but prove that our way of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force is quite right. 
					
					 The U.S. nuclear blackmail will be unworkable for the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Successfully Concluding This Year's Drive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Successfully Concluding This Year's Drive
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls upon all the people to fully display the spirit of invincibility of Juche Korea in single-minded unity around the Party and successfully conclude the drive for this year.
					 All the officials, Party members and other working people should carry through the militant task for this year given by the Party and achieve victories on all the fronts of building a powerful socialist nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 When all the sectors and units of the country unconditionally carry out their tasks for this year, they can glorify the exploits of the Party which has won great victories to be recorded in the history of the country and make a big step forward for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. To successfully conclude this year's drive is very important and responsible for bigger victory and progress in the significant next year.
					
					 The general offensive to hit the targets for this year is a battle of dealing telling blow at the desperate offensive of the brigandish U.S. imperialists and defending the dignity of the socialist country, the cradle of our life and happiness.
					
					 We should successfully conclude this year's drive and thus display the invincibility of Juche Korea dashing toward the final victory under the banner of independence and self-reliance and self-development despite the worst difficulties.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Trump's S. Korea Visit as War Junket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Trump's S. Korea Visit as War Junket
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- An article of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday brands Trump's south Korea junket as a criminal one to distort the history of DPRK-U.S. confrontation at will, slander the DPRK and justify his hostile policy toward it.
					 It was also a dangerous war junket to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK while threatening it with tyrannical force, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Trump trumpeted about the strength of the U.S. during his visit to south Korea. It was a very reckless wild act that may spark off a war.
					
					 Through his behavior, the old war maniac of the U.S. clearly proved that the U.S. administration's "principles on refraining from four acts" was just a fig-leaf to cover up its dark intention. In a word, the rhetoric uttered by Trump can not but be an open declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 We will never be browbeaten by the barking rabid dog.
					
					 Trump is greatly mistaken if he thinks he can check the DPRK from making advance by demonstrating his power.
					
					 It is the stamina of the DPRK to respond to the enemies' knife with sword and their gun with artillery pieces.
					
					 If the U.S. keeps getting keen on its moves to stifle the DPRK, instead of withdrawing the anachronistic hostile policy, it will see for itself the horrible scene which it used to see in its nightmare.

articles.title: Moral Corruption Is Incurable Disease of Capitalist Society: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Moral Corruption Is Incurable Disease of Capitalist Society: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Society in which noble morality serving the popular masses' independent desire and interests has become a common one is the most progressive one while society in which morality serving a handful of the exploiting class's greed and selfish interests prevails is unpopular and reactionary one, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 Genuine morality can be found only in socialist society where there is neither exploitation nor oppression and everything serves the popular masses and in which comradely love, unity and cooperation have become the mainstay of social relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Bourgeois morality is the most unpopular and reactionary one in human history.
					
					 In capitalist society where people from all walks of life have opposing interests and where the desire and interests of capitalist class and monopolistic conglomerates only are justified, there can never be noble and genuine morality of human beings.
					
					 It is the capitalist society where only lie, deception, swindling, cruelty and misanthropy prevail, and conscience, obligation, warm loving care, unity and cooperation are so crudely violated there that even an iota of them can never be found.
					
					 All fields of cultural life including education, literature and arts and sports have been commercialized, seriously hindering the proper ideological and mental development of the popular masses under capitalism. Under the signboards of "freedom" of thinking and "freedom" of religious beliefs, all tints of reactionary and corrupt ideologies and cultures pervade society, benumbing and degenerating sound thinking ability and mentality of the people.
					
					 In capitalist society lots of people turn into the political illiterate, corrupt beings and criminals indifferent to society and collective, to say nothing of the country and the nation.
					
					 The moral corruption getting worse due to the imperialists has no cure. This is an incurable disease of capitalist society.

articles.title: Minju Joson Rejects Japan's Territorial Claim to Tok Islets as Pipe Dream
articles.content:
Minju Joson Rejects Japan's Territorial Claim to Tok Islets as Pipe Dream
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Japan Defense Ministry in its defense white paper, published every year since 2005, has specified Japan's dominium over Tok Islets as a fait accompli. The same thing happened in the defense white paper for this year, too. In the meantime, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan decided to put into practice next year the measure for implementing the future study guidance for primary and secondary schools which made it obligatory to educate students in Japan's dominium over Tok Islets, even though it was originally planned to be applied in 2020 and 2021 respectively.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday dismisses Japan's territorial claim to Tok Islets as a gangster-like far-fetched assertion.
					
					 Japan's territorial claim to Tok Islets is fundamentally different from the issues of retaking territory usurped by other country or restoring the sovereignty of a country in its nature, because Tok Islets are not Japan's territories but part of the inviolable territory of Korea, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Very clear is the reason that Japan is making so strong claim for the islets which are so small as to be marked as a point on map.
					
					 If they make Tok Islets territories of Japan, the islets can be taken as having been occupied by other country and then this will be enough to kindle the ambition for restoration of sovereignty and territory among the Japanese nationals.
					
					 This is the point sought by the Japanese authorities. In order to make a territorial issue and then create conditions favorable for realizing their ambition for militarist reinvasion, the Japanese authorities have become so zealous in their call for dominium over the islets.
					
					 Their scheme for reinvasion while eyeing the post of "leader of Asia" is a foolish dream that can never come true.

articles.title: Kukmin Party Called Pseudo Political Group in S. Korea
articles.content:
Kukmin Party Called Pseudo Political Group in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Representative of the Kukmin Party of south Korea An Chol Su at a "lecture" on November 16 voiced his stand for achieving coalition with the Parun Party for "rational progress" and "reformist conservatives", according to news reports from Seoul.
					 Lurking behind his call is to expand his support base before the local autonomous bodies' elections next year.
					
					 To meet his political strategic purpose, this man is even thinking of removing key members of Honam area who are opposed to coalition.
					
					 As a result, the Kukmin Party is on the verge of collapse due to daily worsening conflict between those who support him and those who are opposed to him.

articles.title: S. Korean Party Urges Withdrawal of GIs
articles.content:
S. Korean Party Urges Withdrawal of GIs
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The People's Democratic Party of south Korea reportedly held a rally and a demo in Seoul on Monday, calling for the liquidation of evils, social drastic reform, conclusion of a peace pact between the DPRK and the U.S. and withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					 Speakers at the rally demanded that Lee Myung Bak be immediately detained and the "Liberal Korea Party" blocking the liquidation of evils be dismantled.
					
					 They stressed the need to drive the GIs out of south Korea by efforts of popular masses and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace pact and build a new society in which the Korean nation lives by its concerted efforts.
					
					 A statement was read out at the rally.
					
					 At the end of the rally, its participants marched as far as the building of the "government".

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Jeers Abe as "Poodle of Trump"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Jeers Abe as "Poodle of Trump"
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on Nov. 21 carried an editorial titled "Abe actively supports Trump's moves for a war of aggression against the north".
					 The editorial charged that Abe is attempting to revive militarism while supporting Trump's moves for a war of aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 He seeks to revise Article 9 of Japan's constitution under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threat from the north" in a bid to justify Japan's arms buildup for aggression, it said, adding:
					
					 A war on the Korean peninsula will bring disaster to Japanese and all other peoples in the world as it will be a lethal nuclear war incomparable with the Second World War.
					
					 Peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world lies in rejecting Japan's attempt at militarist revival and war maniac Trump, the imperialistic U.S. which eggs Japan on to it.

articles.title: S. Korean Society Censured for Putting Profits above Human
articles.content:
S. Korean Society Censured for Putting Profits above Human
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet newspaper of south Korea, carried an editorial titled "Why 19-year old Apprentice Died" on Tuesday.
					 The editorial said the apprentice died in an accident on Nov. 9, revealing that there has been a chain of accidents by which students of high schools met deaths while working in places where even the minimum safety measure is not provided.
					
					 High school students usually work at subcontract factories and they are not schooled about industrial safety, the editorial said, adding that they are just workers paid low in working environment where even the minimum safety measure is not guaranteed.
					
					 Young people suffer from the social evil where the profits are put above human, the editorial said.
					
					 It called for the overall reform of the apprenticeship at enterprises and urged the "government" to give answers to students demanding measures for the prevention of repetition of all kinds of accidents.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Nov. 11.
					 Alexandr Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The remembrance committee decided to organize political and cultural events including seminar and film show in praise of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits on the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: DPRK's Step for Beefing up Nuclear Deterrent Hailed in Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK's Step for Beefing up Nuclear Deterrent Hailed in Nepal
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations and personages of Nepal expressed their support for the Korean people in the struggle to build up a nuclear force against the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless nuclear threat and blackmail.
					 The Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics on Nov. 8 posted on its website Juche-Nepal an article titled "The U.S. nuclear threat against the DPRK will fail".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The grave situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula has once again proved it is none other than the U.S. that schemes to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and rights to existence and development and trigger a nuclear war in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is still clinging to its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and military provocation against it, failing to properly know about the DPRK's strategic position and today's reality, because the former is a fool without any foresight.
					
					 Only bitter defeat will await the U.S. engrossed in its rackets of nuclear war targeting the DPRK.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, said in a statement on Nov. 9:
					
					 The DPRK will never drop its nukes developed by its own efforts and technology despite difficulties.
					
					 We support the stand of the DPRK that it will continue building up the nuclear deterrent to protect its sovereignty as long as the U.S. persists in the hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes serves as a great contribution to ensuring global peace and security.

articles.title: Vocero de MINREX denuncia redefinicion de RPDC como "patrocinador de terrorismo" por EE.UU.
articles.content:
Vocero de MINREX denuncia redefinicion de RPDC como "patrocinador de terrorismo" por EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC con respecto a que EE.UU. redefinio la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "pais patrocinador del terrorismo", el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy la siguiente respuesta.
					El pasado dia 21, EE.UU. alisto otra vez la RPDC en la lista de los "patrocinadores del terrorismo".
					
					Hace poco, Trump solto en la reunion de la ONU las palabras absurdas como "destruccion total" de nuestro Estado y esta vez nos tildo del "patrocinador del terrorismo", lo que es una provocacion grave y una violacion abierta contra nuestro digno Estado.
					
					Desde el ano 1979, el pais norteamericano puso la gorra del "patrocinador de terrorismo" a los paises que no le obedecen. En enero de 1988 la puso a nuestro pais y la quito en octubre de 2008.
					
					Es una cosa extremadamente ilogica y una burla a la paz y seguridad internacionales el hecho de que EE.UU., caudillo del terrorismo de todo tipo, tildara o no a su capricho a otros paises soberanos de "patrocinadores del terrorismo" como si fuera el "juez internacional del terrorismo", sin tener la capacidad de prevenir los actos terroristas dentro de su pais.
					
					Tal farsa de EE.UU. no pasa de ser uno de los medios bandidescos encaminados a aplastar a los paises independientes que no le obedecen y un rotulo para encubrir su incapacidad.
					
					Esta vez, EE.UU. publico, ademas de redefinir, la sancion adicional contra la RPDC so pretexto de interrumpir el fondo ilicito necesario para el "plan ilegal de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea".
					
					Nuestras armas nucleares devienen el disuasivo para defender nuestra soberania y derechos a existencia y desarrollo frente a la extremada politica hostil a la RPDC y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Mientras siga la hostilidad anti-RPDC de EE.UU., se intensificara mas nuestro disuasivo.
					
					A traves de la campana anti-RPDC, el pais norteamericano demostro sin reserva a todo el mundo su intencion de aplastar nuestra idea y regimen valiendose de todos los medios y metodos.
					
					La figura miserable de EE.UU., que habla de la "resolucion pacifica", por una parte y por la otra, tilda a nuestro pais de "terrorista", nos ensena que es justa nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo y hay que tomar mas firmemente la espada nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. se responsabilizara de todas las consecuencias de su provocacion.

articles.title: Portavoz de CCPAP rechaza la campana anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de CCPAP rechaza la campana anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en una reunion ministerial de la Casa Blanca sostenida el dia 20, Trump redefinio coercitivamente la RPDC como "patrocinadora del terrorismo", el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 22 una declaracion.
					Ese dia, Trump disparateo que la redefinicion de la RPDC como "patrocinadora del terrorismo" fue una medida que hubiera sido tomada ya hace mucho tiempo y que el Norte de Corea es el "poder asesino" que amenaza a todo el mundo con las armas nucleares y patrocina los actos terroristas internacionales valiendose de todos los medios y metodos, recuerda el documento y continua:
					
					Dijo que ademas de esta medida se tomaran la sancion adicional y la presion de maximo nivel sobre el Norte de Corea y los paises y figuras individuales que negocian con el pais socialista.
					
					La presente campana anti-RPDC deviene una provocacion politica de categoria especial, que no tiene fundamento ni razon.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos no estaran con brazos cruzados, ya que Trump cometio otra vez la gran provocacion igual a la declaracion de guerra.
					
					Cuanto mas Trump hace desesperaciones para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC, diabolizandola, tanto mas pagara el precio muy caro. Al tenerlo bien presente, el mandatario norteamericano debe abolir de inmediato las imprudentes campanas anti-RPDC y la medida de redefinicion de ella como "patrocinadora del terrorismo".
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer que sus acciones futuras decidiran la contramedida de la RPDC.
					
					En esta oportunidad advierte a la banda de Abe de Japon y las autoridades surcoreanas, marionetas fieles y lisonjeantes de EE.UU., que actuen con prudencia.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con la delegacion de politicos de los partidos europeos
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con la delegacion de politicos de los partidos europeos
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 22 con la delegacion de los politicos de varios partidos europeos, encabezada por el ejecutor en jefe de la Inter-Mediacion, Jonathan Powell, de visita en la RPDC.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre presidentes de grupos parlamentarios de amistad
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre presidentes de grupos parlamentarios de amistad
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 22 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre el presidente del grupo parlamentario de amistad RPDC-Mongolia, Thae Hyong Chol, rector de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, y el presidente del grupo parlamentario de amistad Mongolia-RPDC, Baasankhuu Oktyabri.
					Alli participaron los funcionarios correspondientes, por la parte coreana y por la mongolesa, la comitiva del presidente junto con un miembro de la embajada de Mongolia.
					
					En la ocasion se intercambiaron los criterios sobre desarrollar mas las relaciones entre los grupos parlamentarios de ambos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Michel Aoun
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Michel Aoun
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Libano, Michel Aoun, con motivo del 74o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					En su misiva el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las labores del destinatario por lograr la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais.
